member.name: T:NSCatch.Configuration.LocalCacheOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for local (in-memory) caching.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.LocalCacheOptions.SizeLimit
member.summary: Maximum size limit for the local cache.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.LocalCacheOptions.CompactionPercentage
member.summary: Compaction percentage when size limit is reached.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.LocalCacheOptions.ExpirationScanFrequency
member.summary: Scan frequency for expired items cleanup.

member.name: T:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for Redis caching.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.ConnectionString
member.summary: Redis connection string.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.Database
member.summary: Redis database number to use.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.KeyPrefix
member.summary: Key prefix for all cache entries.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.ConnectTimeout
member.summary: Connection timeout in milliseconds.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.SyncTimeout
member.summary: Sync timeout in milliseconds.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.AllowAdmin
member.summary: Whether to allow admin operations.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.AbortOnConnectFail
member.summary: Whether to abort connection on connect failure.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.RedisCacheOptions.ConnectRetry
member.summary: Number of connection retry attempts.

member.name: T:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for hybrid caching (local + Redis).

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.Local
member.summary: Local cache configuration for the hybrid setup.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.Redis
member.summary: Redis cache configuration for the hybrid setup.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.LocalCacheExpiration
member.summary: Expiration time for items in the local cache layer. Items will be kept in local cache for this duration before checking Redis.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.SyncOnStartup
member.summary: Whether to sync local cache with Redis on startup.

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.WriteThrough
member.summary: Whether to use write-through caching (write to both local and Redis simultaneously).

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.WriteBehind
member.summary: Whether to use write-behind caching (write to local immediately, Redis asynchronously).

member.name: P:NSCatch.Configuration.HybridCacheOptions.WriteBehindInterval
member.summary: Interval for write-behind synchronization with Redis.

member.name: T:NSCatch.Enumerations.CacheProviderType
member.summary: Specifies the type of cache provider to use.

member.name: F:NSCatch.Enumerations.CacheProviderType.Local
member.summary: In-memory cache for single instance applications.

member.name: F:NSCatch.Enumerations.CacheProviderType.Redis
member.summary: Distributed Redis cache for scalable applications.

member.name: F:NSCatch.Enumerations.CacheProviderType.Hybrid
member.summary: Hybrid cache that tries local first, then Redis.

member.name: T:NSCatch.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for configuring NSCatch cache services.

member.name: M:NSCatch.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddNSCache(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,NSCatch.Interfaces.ICatchOption,System.String)
member.summary: Adds NSCatch cache services using a specific ICatchOption implementation. The cache type is automatically determined by the ICatchOption type.
member.param: The cache option instance implementing ICatchOption.
The unique cache key for this cache instance (used for service isolation).

member.name: M:NSCatch.Extensions.ServiceCollectionExtensions.RegisterCoreServices(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,NSCatch.Interfaces.ICatchOption,System.String)
member.summary: Registers core cache services based on the specific ICatchOption type.
member.param: The cache option to configure services for.
The unique cache key for this cache instance.

member.summary: Creates the appropriate cache manager based on the cache option type.

member.summary: Creates a hybrid cache manager.

member.summary: Registers services specific to hybrid caching.

member.summary: Defines the contract for cache management operations.

member.summary: Gets a cached value by key.
member.typeparam: The type of the cached value.
member.returns: The cached value or null if not found.

member.summary: Sets a value in the cache with an optional expiration time.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to cache.

member.name: M:NSCatch.Interfaces.ICacheManager.RemoveAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Removes a cached value by key.

member.summary: Removes all cached values matching a pattern.
member.param: The pattern to match keys (supports wildcards like *).

member.summary: Checks if a key exists in the cache.

member.summary: Clears all cached values.

member.summary: Gets or sets a cached value with a factory function.

member.param: Factory function to create the value if not cached.
member.returns: The cached or newly created value.
